# Prerequisites 

1. Download **OpenMS** <a href="https://sourceforge.net/projects/open-ms/" target="blank"></a> for converting the format of MS2-files 

2. (optional) Download **WinSCP** <a href="https://winscp.net/eng/downloads.php></a> for transferring local files to server of GNPS

3. Export MS2-files as .mzML from $dataanalysis$

4. In order to install all essential packages, please run script **set_up_enviroment.R** under the folder of **J:\\CBMR\\SUN-CBMR-Metabolomics\\Workflow\\utils\\utils_MS2_set_up** before doing any step

5. If you would like to use tools on GNPS, please register for your personal username and password
